participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Carefree and free-spirited, Lily enjoys living in the moment and is often lost in her thoughts.
participant_1.background: I binged on British shows and movies while I was confined to my bed on vacation. I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts. I am a carefree, fun-loving, free-spirited person. I enjoy John Grisham movies, but not his books. I enjoy cold winters and strong breezes.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jake loves to stay active and enjoys various hobbies that keep him engaged.
participant_2.background: I remember buying my first bicycle when I was 12 years old. I like to play basketball. I still play the drums to keep my hand-eye coordination and stamina in shape. I like collecting rocks. I like to drive for hours.

content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Doing well! I am currently binge watching British shows and movies while I am confined to my bed on vacation.
Oh fun! I love British shows! What are you watching?
I am watching "Killing Eve". It is so good. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play basketball, go for drives, and play the drums.
I love drives! I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
Same! It's so relaxing and freeing.
What kind of music do you like to play on the drums?
I like to play a lot of different kinds of music, but I really enjoy playing rock and roll.
That's awesome! I love rock and roll too!
No, I wish I did! I really want to learn how to play the drums.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to relieve stress.
I know! I'm going to try to find some lessons soon
